comments: Tests covering query state checkpointing smoke test cases

tests.name: global_aggr_in_substream
tests.description: global aggregation in substream state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_state_stream5
create stream test19_state_stream5 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))
subscribe to select id, count(*) over (partition by id), min(value) over (partition by id), max(value) over (partition by id) from test19_state_stream5 settings checkpoint_interval=1
insert into test19_state_stream5(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev1', 'ca', 57.3, '2020-02-02 20:00:00')
insert into test19_state_stream5(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev2', 'ca', 58.3, '2020-02-02 20:00:02')
insert into test19_state_stream5(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev1', 'ca', 68, '2020-02-02 20:00:03')
insert into test19_state_stream5(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev2', 'ca', 70, '2020-02-02 20:00:04')
unsubscribe to '19100'

tests.name: recover_global_aggr_in_substream

create stream test19_state_stream5 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))
subscribe to select id, count(*) over (partition by id), min(value) over (partition by id), max(value) over (partition by id) from test19_state_stream5 settings checkpoint_interval=1

tests.name: tumble_window_aggr_in_substream

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_state_stream5
create stream test19_state_stream5 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))

subscribe to select id, count(*) over (partition by id), min(value) over (partition by id), max(value) over (partition by id), window_start, window_end from tumble(test19_state_stream5, timestamp, 5s) group by window_start, window_end settings checkpoint_interval=1

insert into test19_state_stream5(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev1', 'ca', 67, '2020-02-02 20:00:07')
insert into test19_state_stream5(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev1', 'ca', 55, '2020-02-02 20:00:11')
insert into test19_state_stream5(id, location, value, timestamp) values ('dev2', 'ca', 77, '2020-02-02 20:00:12')
unsubscribe to '19103'

tests.name: tumble_window_aggr_in_substream_with_delay_interval
tests.description: tumble window aggregation in substream with delay interval state checkpoint

statements.query: drop stream if exists test19_state_stream5
create stream test19_state_stream5 (id string, location string, value float, timestamp datetime64(3) default now64(3))

subscribe to select id, count(*), min(value), max(value), window_start, window_end from tumble(test19_state_stream5, timestamp, 5s) partition by id group by window_start, window_end emit stream after watermark with delay 2s settings checkpoint_interval=1
